Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer and had lumpectomy in August.  Results showed no spread to lymph nodes.  I have just finished five weeks of radiotherapy and have been taking tamoxifen for the last ten weeks. 1 like, 3 replies Report 1
Posts.Title: having problems with cough and back pain plus weight loss since i started taking tamoxifen Posted 30

Posts.Content: Very pleased that no spread shown. Can't help regards the meds. Just want to give support. You should have a support nurse who you can contact to get the advice you need. I have been ok with my meds which is letrozole, few hot flushes but that's it. Report
Posts.Title: having problems with cough and back pain plus weight loss since i started taking tamoxifen Posted 30

Posts.Content: Hi Janet.  Thanks for your reply and support.  I have a breastcare nurse so i will give her a call. May suggest i  change to letrozole as this definately isnt suiting me. Report
Posts.Title: having problems with cough and back pain plus weight loss since i started taking tamoxifen Posted 30
